WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryGBA_Shortage_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e6ce4774356241d689b72338c611664d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Nous n'avons pas assez de bras...
Y aurait-il moyen d'avoir [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]plus de Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"] ?
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryGBA_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="60cdaf960f9446589f44d878ad0b955d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Combine les efforts[System:Color name="Default"] d'[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] et des Pikmin.
Ensemble, ils vont pouvoir transporter ça !
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHornBell_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5e070171e5ba4972b30f5a1adc6abe8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]C'est trop haut, [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]pas moyen de l'atteindre[System:Color name="Default"]...
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHornBell_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="01caa94ca9b5458eb254fb043a5d9a0b" Scale="0.9239131"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]En [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]lançant[System:Color name="Default"] un Pikmin, il y arriverait peut-être...
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHimeFork_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5223a57ea2914b7a9fe79bcca4c059b3" Scale="0.9259259"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Donne l'[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]instruction[System:Color name="Default"] à [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] de transporter ça.
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHimeFork_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="390e4b7f7bfa4c72bc897ced66017260" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Rapportons ça au [Grammar:WordAttr Type="Masculine" DefArt="0" IndefArt="2" Count="Singular"/]Beagle !
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_PotDelete: [Npc:Icon chara="NoChara"/][UE:Meta key="b1886077733f4a139d898dfc3d8ef354" Scale="1"/]Ça alors ! Toute la terre a été retirée !
